items.label: 30 days before any gift event, your EA sends you 5 gift ideas
You respond with a number 1-5 (95% of the time) or request more options
The gift arrives on time, you get an excited thank-you text

messages.name: Sarah (EA)
messages.text: Hi! Mom's birthday is in 30 days. Here are 5 gift ideas:

1. Ceramic planter set - $45
2. Cashmere scarf - $89
3. Cooking class voucher - $120
4. Photo book of family pics - $65
5. Spa gift card - $100
All available on Amazon with 2-day shipping. Which number?
Done! Confirmation coming to your email.

content.text: Send your EA this playbook link and ask them to populate historical gift data by searching your email for past purchases. They should go back at least 3 years. Once the database is populated, ask them to set up 30-day reminder triggers for each gift event type.

faq.question: How far in advance should my EA start looking for gifts?
faq.answer: Default is 30 days. Modify this in the Airtable formula if you prefer more or less lead time. Some gifts (custom items, international shipping) may need 6+ weeks.

faq.question: What if I don't like any of the gift ideas?
faq.answer: Simply reply asking for more options with new direction. Your EA will research 5 more ideas based on your feedback.

faq.question: Can I add business contacts to this system?
faq.answer: Yes. Many clients use this for investor relations, key customers, and team members. Just add them to the People tab with appropriate gift value ranges.
